dcterms:creator: B. Alharbi
H. Alamro
M. Alshehri

M. Kalkatawi
I.I. Jaber
X. Zhang
dcterms:description: A Twitter-based benchmark Arabic sentiment analysis dataset that was collected using Twitter API between May 2012 and April 2020. The dataset was filtered to ensure sufficient Arabic texts for annotation, resulting in a corpus of 100,000 tweets, of which 25,000 were annotated with six speech act categories.
dcterms:title: ASAD

dcterms:creator: A. Elmadany
H. Mubarak
W. Magdy
dcterms:description: An Arabic speech-act and sentiment corpus of tweets that includes speech act labels and sentiment analysis. The dataset was collected using the Twitter API and is designed to facilitate research in Arabic speech act classification.
dcterms:title: ArSAS
